name: stakeout
effect: This Pokémon's moves have double power against Pokémon that switched in this turn.
short_effect: This Pokémon's moves have double power against Pokémon that switched in this turn.

flavor_text.sun_moon: Doubles the damage dealt to the target’s replacement if the target switches out.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Doubles the damage dealt to the target’s replacement if the target switches out.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Doubles the damage dealt to the target’s replacement if the target switches out.
